solution_line_template: Janet paid with ${paid_amount} and got back ${change_back}, so her muffins cost ${paid_amount} - ${change_back} = $<<{paid_amount}-{change_back}={muffins_total_cost}>>{muffins_total_cost}.
Each muffin cost {muffin_cost_cents} cents, so she bought {muffins_total_cost}/{muffin_cost_dollars} = <<{muffins_total_cost}/{muffin_cost_dollars}={num_muffins}>>{num_muffins} muffins
